mapper.select: SELECT id,node_code AS nodeCode,todo_title AS todeTitle,todo_content AS todoContent,todo_type AS todoType, business_json AS businessJson,submit_node_code AS submitNodeCode,submit_node_name AS submitNodeName, CONVERT(varchar(100), create_time, 20) AS createTime,registrant_id AS registrantId,registrant FROM t_w_todo WHERE execute_person_id = #{userId} AND node_code =#{nodeCode} AND status = '0' ORDER BY createTime ASC

select top 1 id, node_code, execute_person_id, execute_person_name, todo_title, todo_content, todo_type, business_json, table_name, business_id, registrant, registrant_id, detail_config, status, create_time, operation_time, submit_node_code, submit_node_name from t_w_todo where business_id = #{businessId} and node_code = #{nodeCode} and execute_person_id = #{executePersonId}
mapper.update: update t_w_todo set status = #{afterTodoStatus},operation_time = GETDATE() where business_id = #{businessId} and status != #{afterTodoStatus}
